title: Android mobile application
desc: Build a mobile version of an already existing web application.1.	Compatibility with Android is required> = 4.42.	Application can be installed on different hardware3.	The application does not need to be distributed on the Play Store4.	It should be developed in a native environment (Android Studio) java or kotlin5.	Communication via REST with the remote server in https with the ability to handle both self-signed and non-certified certificates6.	The purpose of the application is to show a series of items (posts and comments) and allow the user to respond to one or more items, with text and images coming from camera or gallery.7.     Items to be displayed can have text, images and some other informations8.     All data resides on our remote server and should not be saved on the device9.     Authentication is performed via JWT10.   JWT token expire in 15 minutes so it must be refreshed via worker11.   JWT token must be attached on each GET/POST via header or via URL12.   Application interact only with or remote server13.   Clean code with comments is a must

title: Sound Data Transfer / Data over sound transfer - IOS - ANDROID - PYTHON
desc: The project consist creating a class that, using only free resources and simple implementation methods do the following:*One class for Swift 4 (Object C not accepted)*One in Java for Android*One class in Python for both for linux and windows (so, all modules must work on both architectures)The source must be native and no deprecated methods should be used.The sound generated must works between all those three platforms.They must pair with all platforms that have a sound generator source and a sound receiver device. (A microfone and a speaker)It should works like chirp or lisnr.- Functions that should be implemented (Both on Receiver and Sender)*Pair each device (One  to One Relationship) - For each operation, one device can only pair with another one.*Open a channel for transferring data*Recognize the Sender and Receiver*Stablish a handshake between both devices*Send / Receive string values*End the transmissionThe sound wave generated must be inaudible... up 18KHZ until 22KHZThe transfer must work in a range between 8 to 10 meters.The transfer will only send string values. As this kind of transmission now a days can transfer about 7kb/s so there is no need to be more than that.On the python class, It must have a function that creates what is supposed to be transmitted and save the wav file format on disk. (not on IOS or Android)It is important that the classes come with example projects that can be compiled and tested.It is also important a good documentation about everything coded.Test classes must be coded.The source code must be provided with out any licensing and neither implementations must be used with proprietary libs or any type of charge.

title: Academic Calendar
desc: The idea of this application is to provide a simple to use calendar, specific to deadlines for any UKUniversity students. We are wanting a simple application in the form of a calendar that allows the user to record important deadlines in relation to his/her degree. It will be for the use of UK universitystudents and will therefore need space for the relevant information.The main idea of the calendar is that the student can add a course and specify the title of the course, the type of work, the date it is due, what percentage of the course the assignment is worth, length of the assignment and have the ability to set an alarm notification.The deadline calendar:The calendar need to have a function to create a course with space to add a few relevant pieces ofinformation; the course, the assignment titles; the percentage/weight of the assignment; the wordlength; type of assessment and the due date. We need the possibility to add a number of courses and from in them subsections to add the essay titles. Each title would need a description box in which the user could add the rest of the relevant information. As the student will provide the appropriate information the use of drop-down menus' will not be needed, only spaces for the student to fill in information itself. It is important that the calendar keeps track on where the course headline is, where the type of work information is, the length and weighting as this is necessary when receiving the notification.The reminder:Once all the information is added the user will be provided with a due date countdown informing them how many days are left until the deadline with the ability to activate regular in app notifications. The student should have the possibility to set an reminder for the different courses and assignments, he/she has created. When a deadline is due, there will be a notification, saying that an assignment is due, followed by the information the student has provided in the created course event.Deadline:The deadline for the project is the 17th November. This application will need to be completed andapproved by the 17th of November, with the possibility to request any tweaks or changes that arenecessary

title: Smart Monitor

The software has the following features:a)  App access via account login or fingerprint detectionb)  Integration with Apple Watch and FIT BITc)  Bluetooth connectivity using sensorsd)  Comprehensive dashboarde)  Reportingf)  Information data sharing with othersg) Sending emails from apph) Product ordering through app with data transfer to WooCommercei)  Payment via credit card, Apple Pay, Android Pay and fingerprintj)  Automatic detection of app software upgrades with automatic download to devicesYou will need to be well experienced in structured programming techniquesInterested in hearing from consultants with experience in developing software for medical devices. This software will be used to help customers manage their health much like FIT BIT.Hourly rate (with estimated hours required) and fixed price accepted. You will be required to sign a legally enforceable confidentiality agreement. Please do not apply if you are not experienced in medical device software development and do not intend to sign a confidentiality agreement.

title: Mobile development
desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  I am looking for website and mobile app similar to Airbnb
